TopicTitle: Why can't they make KSP lanyards

Articles.Content:
Why can't there be Kerbal Space Program Lanyards in the store???

I would think alot of people would buy them!

Comment and comment about this

Why can't there be Kerbal Space Program Lanyards in the store???

Because lanyards are use to fire cannon and Kerbals have no artillery.

Because Kerbals don't use lanyards, even when doing EVA. There was an experimental attempt at lanyards called KAS but 0.24 seems to have killed it.
Oh, i thought lanyards are used to clipping keys togethet :-D
This suggestion for game merchandise has been moved to the Suggestions sub-forum.
The don't trust us enough to not hurt ourselves?
Well I kind of what a lanyard for school. I got id's and would love to show my love of kerbal space program
